title: Edmonton Oilers ' revenue 2005 to 2019
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Revenue in million U.S. dollars, with a total of 14 data points. The chart has 5 significant trends.
The longest trend is slightly positive which exists from 2012/13 to 2008/09.
Additionally, the next significant trend is slightly positive which exists from 2008/09 to 2005/06.
Additionally, the next significant trend is slightly negative which exists from 2018/19 to 2016/17.
Contrarily, the next significant trend is extremely negative which exists from 2016/17 to 2014/15.
On the contrary, the next significant trend is extremely positive which exists from 2014/15 to 2012/13.
gold: This graph depicts the annual National Hockey League revenue of the Edmonton Oilers from the 2005/06 season to the 2018/19 season . The revenue of the Edmonton Oilers amounted to 154 million U.S. dollars in the 2018/19 season .
